availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H Bayer (Franklin County, Kentucky shoemaker)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky shoemaker. Native of Baden, Germany. Married Mary Anna Kaltenbrun Bayer in 1859. Shoemaker in Frankfort in 1860 and in Paducah in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #266203, p. 18 July 1859
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Frankliln County, Frankfort, p. 238
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 182B
